quotes.quote: There are two types of people in this world - those who do what they're told and those who stay true to themselves. Most people think you're supposed to follow a predetermined path, keep your head down, obey the rules, do whatever's popular. But some prefer to follow their own path in life.
If you live life by other people's standards, then your life is no longer yours.
The stronger a person looks, the weaker he is.
